mapper.insert: insert into basic_thirdapp (pkid, appkey, name, appurl, appsecret, status, icon,linktarget, createtime) values (#{pkid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{appkey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appsecret,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{linktarget,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update basic_thirdapp set appkey = #{appkey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, appurl = #{appurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, appsecret = #{appsecret,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, linktarget = #{linktarget,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where pkid = #{pkid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select pkid, appkey, name, appurl, appsecret,icon, status, createtime,linktarget from basic_thirdapp
select pkid, appkey, name, appurl, appsecret,icon, status, createtime,linktarget from basic_thirdapp WHERE appkey=#{0} limit 1
